seo.title: Home - WholeSelf Counseling
seo.description: A safe space for your healing journey

hero.headline: Healing that centers your wholeself
hero.description: WholeSelf Counseling is a therapy collective built by, for, and staffed by people of color. We are grounded in abolitionist values and decolonial healing practices that challenge oppressive systems and affirm the full humanity of our communities.

items.title: Culturally-rooted therapy
items.description: Decolonial practices that honor your identity

items.title: Virtual & in-person
items.description: Flexible options to meet you where you are
